item.title: Entrepreneur Alleges ESPN ‘Copycat’ Her Tech to Help Sports Fans Find Games
item.description: ESPN in August of last year tried to prove its utility to all fans by unveiling a “Where to Watch” search feature in its mobile app and website that would do something every sports aficion
